question: My father income is haram and i told him about it and he said that h'll try to get rid of this inshALlah.
answer:
QUESTION

My father income is haram and i told him about it and he said that h'll try to get rid of this inshALlah.SO basically i m trying to help my father by giving him 400 $ per month (which i get cuz myself i work for halal buisness as a part time employee).I am giving him 400$ for my expenses like (for my rent ,food).so am i doing this right cuz i dunt want any haram or anything.Can u advice me ,what should i do?May ALlah grant you for your great work .Make dua please.

ANSWER


Share:

Your expenses for rent, food, etc. will be regarded from your contribution. You should continue advising your father and also assist him to change his income.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
